summary: A one-room player abode just outside the main gates to Markarth.
descriptionHtml:
[center][heading][b][size=14][color=#3174d2]Hole in the Wall - Markarth[/color][/size][/b][/heading]
[img]http://i1079.photobucket.com/albums/w503/ytnam/Skyrim/Hole%20in%20the%20Wall%20-%20Markarth/Interior.jpg[/img][/center]
A player room with a small amount of safe storage and an alchemist's table, just outside the gates to Markarth. Designed for starting new characters, just a small base until you find your feet.
Minimal storage (all safe) and alchemy, with cooking available just outside.
All smithing stations and wood chopping available just inside the gates!
Comes with free Markarth guards!

Also in this style

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77175?]Hole in the Wall Compilation[/url]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56050/?]Hole in the Wall - Whiterun[/url]
